package.name: Auto_Subscribe_to_Newsletter_on_registration
package.summary: Enable automatic customer's subscription to your newsletter when they register to your shop.
package.description:
By default, when a customer registers to your shop (either through the sign-in link, either through the check-out process), he isn't automatically subscribed to your newsletter.
This extension allows to automatically subscribe your customer to your newsletter when they register to your shop.
You can setup if you want to activate it: - on customer registration - on customer registration during check out
Email confirmation are still being sent to the customer mentionning that he is now subscribed to the Newsletter.
